summary: This document is an email chain from April 2021 regarding an American Express referral related to Jeffrey Epstein. An American Express manager from the Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit is providing previously mentioned information about Epstein to a recipient, likely a law enforcement contact.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email chain discusses an American Express referral regarding Jeffrey Epstein, indicating financial records or information about him are being shared.

events.title: American Express Referral Email Sent
events.description: An American Express manager from the Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit sends an email containing a referral or information regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Referral Email Forwarded
events.description: The initial American Express referral email from April 21 is forwarded to another recipient, noted as '(USANYS)', which likely refers to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: American Express's Special Investigations Financial Intelligence Unit was involved in providing information related to Jeffrey Epstein in April 2021.
The communication indicates ongoing financial investigation or information sharing regarding Epstein years after his death.
The email was forwarded to a recipient tagged as '(USANYS)', suggesting coordination with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
